Address.value: 299 PARK AVENUE,13TH FLOOR 2ND FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10171, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tiptree Inc is a United States-based company that provides specialty insurance products and related services. It has two reportable segments: Insurance and Mortgage. The insurance segment provides specialty insurance, warranty products and related administration services; and the Mortgage segment originates, sell and service conventional, conforming agency and government-insured residential mortgage loans.
